name: The Descent (itch) (novalolxd)
description:
Welcome to the pits.

An abandoned plot of land, home to the world's most dangerous creatures. In the pit, you will find the lost treasures of those who came before you and failed. Desend into the pits and discover your own path. But time is of the essence.

Controls -
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse - Fire
